title: Server down?
body:
It says busy can't log in?

Never mind I'm in now... must have been too much traffic?

replies.body:
did you try anything specific? because i keep trying to log in and i keep getting the same error message.
"There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client."

> [{quoted}](name=The Fiddler,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2WPPYfXZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-02T10:28:15.320+0000)
>
> did you try anything specific? because i keep trying to log in and i keep getting the same error message.
> "There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client."

Just waited a bit and it suddenly let me log in. Your issue sounds different though.
i would understand to much traffic if the servers crashed and everyone was trying to log back in all at once but this is oce the traffic cant be that high
